segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks outside that window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden is so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and the woman doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the floor and the cabinets getting ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to slip and fall in that mess if they’re not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to the edge, and the girl is just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in her own little world, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me anxious just watching it.
segments.speaker: PAR
